org.seedstack.jcache

Enum JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy>
      • org.seedstack.jcache.JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy>
    Enclosing class:
    JCacheConfig

    public static enum JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy
extends Enum<JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy>
    Enumerates all built-in expiry policies.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACCESSED
      An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on the last time it was accessed.
      CREATED
      An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on when it was created.
      ETERNAL
      An eternal ExpiryPolicy specifies that Cache Entries won't expire.
      MODIFIED
      An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on the last time it was updated.
      TOUCHED
      An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on when it was last touched.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Enum

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • TOUCHED

        public static final JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy TOUCHED
        An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on when it was last touched. A touch includes creation, update or access.

      • ACCESSED

        public static final JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy ACCESSED
        An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on the last time it was accessed. Accessed does not include a cache update.

      • CREATED

        public static final JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy CREATED
        An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on when it was created. An update does not reset the expiry time.

      • ETERNAL

        public static final JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy ETERNAL
        An eternal ExpiryPolicy specifies that Cache Entries won't expire. This however doesn't mean they won't be evicted if an underlying implementation needs to free-up resources where by it may choose to evict entries that are not due to expire.

      • MODIFIED

        public static final JCacheConfig.ExpiryPolicy MODIFIED
        An ExpiryPolicy that defines the expiry Duration of a Cache Entry based on the last time it was updated. Updating includes created and changing (updating) an entry.

        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows:

    System.out.println(c);
